body_html:
I think this would be a great addition to TF if somebody would have the cycles to work on it. I'm not sure the TF team has cycles to work on this in the short term, but would be happy to advice and review PRs.

As @zheng-xq suggests, perhaps this should live in contrib & stream executor to begin with.

body:
I think this would be a great addition to TF if somebody would have the cycles to work on it. I'm not sure the TF team has cycles to work on this in the short term, but would be happy to advice and review PRs.

As @zheng-xq suggests, perhaps this should live in contrib & stream executor to begin with.
